#define CALCULATOR_H

public:
    static double add(double a, double b);      // åªå£°æ˜æ¥å£
    static double multiply(double a, double b); // ä¸æš´éœ²å®ç°ç»†èŠ‚
};

// src/calculator.cpp - å®ç°å®šä¹‰

    return a + b;  // å…·ä½“å®ç°
}

double Calculator::multiply(double a, double b) {
    return a * b;  // å…·ä½“å®ç°
}

2.2 æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹

calculator.h

#ifndef CALCULATOR_H
#define CALCULATOR_H

class Calculator {
public:
    static int add(int a, int b);
    static int multiply(int a, int b);
};

#endif

calculator.cpp

#include "calculator.h"

int Calculator::add(int a, int b) {
    return a + b;
}

int Calculator::multiply(int a, int b) {
    return a * b;
}

main.cpp

#include "calculator.h"
#include <iostream>

int main() {
    int result = Calculator::add(5, 3);
    std::cout << "5 + 3 = " << result << std::endl;
    return 0;
}

// å¤§é‡æ ‡å‡†åº“ä»£ç ...
class Calculator {
public:
    static int add(int a, int b);
    static int multiply(int a, int b);
};

    std::cout << "5 + 3 = " << result << std::endl;
    return 0;
}
